space_shooter module¶

This module contains the main function of the space_hooter game.

platform

Linux

author

Ovod18


space_shooter.draw_text(surface, text, size, x, y)¶

Rendering text on the surface.

Param

surface: a surface for drowing text

Type

surface: object

Param

text: text for drowing

Type

text: str

Param

size: text size

Type

size: int

Param

x,y: the coordinates for drowing text

Type

size: int
